channel.title: Making server public
channel.description:
How the hell do i make my server public lol? Im using devolution 7.0 source. I got no-ip clicked the box runserver and compile works i can login in though piscape.no-ip.org no one else can. Wtf my ipconfig dont work.my path works my classpath works my javac works help! It would eb nice to help me through team viewer 4! I dont have a router! Help and i will reward!
~Thanks geeno~
Rewards! 1. Awsome video for whatevr made by me. (will be posted on youtube) 2. I can code a server. 3. Make an awsome website for anything. (ex. http://porkpistols.smfforfree.com/) 4. All of these if you do this and help me get talking NPC's (devolution 7 source)
